item.title: CVE-2022-23802|2024-08-04T08:42:25.786Z -- ijoomla.com -- guru
item.description: Joomla Guru extension 5.2.5 is affected by: Insecure Permissions. The impact is: obtain sensitive information (remote). The component is: Access to private information and components, possibility to view other users' information. Information disclosure Access to private information and components, possibility to view other users' information.
